name: semantic-tagger
description: A build pipeline task to add a timestamp pre-release tag to a semantic version.
helpMarkDown: Will set the tagged version in the build variable $(TaggedSemanticVersion). [More info](https://github.com/setagana/semantic-tagger)
author: Matthew de Beer

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Semantic version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a version number to be tagged. Must adhere to the [Semantic Versioning 2.0 Standard](https://semver.org/).

inputs.name: onExistingTag
inputs.label: On existing tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the provided version already contains a pre-release tag, how should it be handled?

inputs.name: prefix
inputs.label: Pre-release tag prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a prefix for the pre-release tag. May only contain alphanumerics and hyphens and as such does not support period-separated identifiers as described in SemVer V2.

inputs.name: addTimestamp
inputs.label: Add timestamp to tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally add a unix timestamp to the prerelease tag. If true, the final tag will be **-{prefix}{timestamp}** or **-{existingtag}{timestamp}**.

inputs.name: setBuildNumber
inputs.label: Set Build Number to tagged version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally set the Build Number of the current build to the version once it's tagged.
